message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you.  I'm asking $175 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down a bit to $160.  Let's see if we can make this work.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $160 is still a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm really interested in the product and I think we can find a mutually beneficial price.
Bob, I hear you.  I'm willing to come down a bit more to $145.  I'm confident you'll find this product really valuable, and I think this price is fair for both of us. Let's make a deal!

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $145, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
